metadata.title: CVE-2017-5200 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Salt-api in SaltStack Salt before 2015.8.13, 2016.3.x before 2016.3.5, and2016.11.x before 2016.11.2 allows arbitrary command execution on asalt-master via Salt's ssh_client.Users of Salt-API and salt-ssh could execute a command on the saltmaster via a hole when both systems were enabled.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
